channel.title: Cannot connect to server under any Circumstances
channel.description:
Please help me. I have tried to connect to 20+ servers and I keey saying that I can't connect, that the server must be down. I was also getting this error message:
Server: Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?
So I changed my port to 5555 now I'm not getting any message like that, just not letting me connect. I also can't connect to 127.0.0.1, localhost or 0.0.0.0
Please help, very frustrated
Thank you.

Notepad can’t find server in the client

item.title: Cannot connect to server under any Circumstances
item.dc:creator: @crazyjackson2185 crazyjackson2185
item.description:
@crazyjackson2185 wrote:

[quote=“xocean, post:10, topic:374117”]Basically your asking for spoon feed ;)?

Go to your source

Find Client.java

CTRL+F

127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0

If you want to connect to localhost - Make sure it’s 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0

Then click run, then try login with your client, should be sorted.

Btw, make sure you compile if the ip isent set to 127.

And make sure the client is 127.0.0.1 too, Client.java same procedure.[/quote]

what do I type in after I press ctrl + f? I typed in serverip and just ip and nothing came up

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot connect to server under any Circumstances

item.title: Cannot connect to server under any Circumstances
item.dc:creator: @xocean xocean
item.description:
@xocean wrote:

Basically your asking for spoon feed ;)?

Go to your source

Find Client.java

CTRL+F

127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0

If you want to connect to localhost - Make sure it’s 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0

Then click run, then try login with your client, should be sorted.

Btw, make sure you compile if the ip isent set to 127.

And make sure the client is 127.0.0.1 too, Client.java same procedure.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot connect to server under any Circumstances
item.dc:creator: @crazyjackson2185 crazyjackson2185
item.description:
@crazyjackson2185 wrote:

thank you so much I will go do this

Edit: I went to a download page all I saw was download Moparscape, not download source >.<

Edit: I went to this thread http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,459671.240.html

and downloaded the server and client, now what do I do? Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot connect to server under any Circumstances

item.title: Cannot connect to server under any Circumstances
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nts253 Anc13nts253
item.description:
@Anc13nts253 wrote:

crazyjackson2185:

Man I feel nooby right now. I don’t know, I downloaded the Moparscape client.

The Moparscape client isn’t a server alone, you must be running a source to login with the client.

Go to the downloads section to download a source with a client, then change the Login Ip for the client to localhost & run the server from your connection. Then you’ll be able to login, no one else will be able to though.

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot connect to server under any Circumstances

item.title: Cannot connect to server under any Circumstances
item.dc:creator: @crazyjackson2185 crazyjackson2185
item.description:
@crazyjackson2185 wrote:

Java Is So Cool:

Maybe it’s because all servers including mine do not accept the MoparScape client, and if your trying to connect to the HybridScape on 3.2 client click “start server” and then login, and it should run and start you off in Varrock east mine.

I really appreciate all the help you’re giving me. What to I do to log into “HybridScape”? What Ip do I type in :S

Where do I get a client that servers will accept?

Is HybridScape a client?

Read full topic
